document.full_text: hollywood studio warner bros has released a short trailer boasting the "first look behind the scenes" of "harry potter and the deathly hallows - part 2," the final installment in the hit franchise.
document.title: harry potter studio releases trailer of final film
lines_and_colors: hollywood studio warner bros has released a short trailer boasting the "first look behind the scenes" of "harry potter and the deathly hallows - part 2," the final installment in the hit franchise.
